name: Plugin Disabler
author: Christian Bautista

sections.description:
Features

  • Disable selected plugins on specific posts and pages
  • Disable selected plugins on Home page
  • Disbale selected plugins on custom post types
  • Disable selected plugins on 404 pages and other pages that has no saved IDs

WordPress offers a lot of free and paid plugins that can be downloaded easily. It makes sense to utilize this feature but if too many are installed it will affect the loading speed of the website greatly. It does not make sense to use load all the resources of the plugin on the pages where it’s not being used at all.

Maximize all plugins and optimize it at the same time.

short_description: Plugin Disabler is a plugin that will help to optimize the website by removing unused plugins on selected pages
